If you choose not to save screenshots in the database, your screenshots will not appear in the memory tab of corresponding games

saveDir.placeholder: Enter the root path to save screenshots

namingRule.title: Naming Rule
namingRule.description:
Naming rule for each screenshot file, path-invalid characters [<>:"/\|?*] are not allowed
Currently supported placeholders:

%name% - the active game's title (with path-disallowed characters sanitized)
%datetime% - date time when the screenshot was taken
%timestamp% - unix epoch (ms) when the screenshot was taken

proxy.bypassRulesDescription:
List of addresses that do not connect through the proxy server, separated by commas
Example: .foobar.com,*test.com,192.168.1.1/16,<local>
<local> represents local addresses (127.0.0.1 or localhost)
